description: Numerator of sum_{p prime, p-1 divides 2*n} 1/p.
mathematica: a[n_] := Sum[ Boole[ PrimeQ[d+1] ]/(d+1), {d, Divisors[2n]}] // Numerator; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 48}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Aug 10 2012 *)
prog: (PARI)a(n)={    my(bd=0);    forprime (p=2, 2*n+1, if( (2*n)%(p-1)==0, bd += 1/p;  ) );    bd = numerator(bd);    return(bd);}/* _Joerg Arndt_, May 06 2012 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
